pkgmetadata.longdescription: R Access to the 'FMP Cloud' and 'Financial Modeling Prep' API // Use R to access to the 'FMP Cloud' API https://fmpcloud.io/ and 'Financial Modeling Prep' API https://financialmodelingprep.com/developer/docs/. Data available includes stock prices, market indexes, company fundamentals, 13F holdings data, and much more. A valid API token must be set to enable functions.
